hopobject.name: BBConsole
hopobject.pname: BBConsole - Bluetooth 4.0 Console Adapter for BeagleBone Black
hopobject.body:
BBConsole lets you connect Linux console of BeagleBone Black to any latest Android device with Bluetooth Low Energy, or an iOS device (iPhone or iPad/iPod).

  • Access the console on your smartphone or PC via Bluetooth 4.0 (you don't need another monitor!)
  • Works with Bluetooth 4.0 enabled Android and iOS smartphones
  • Designed for BeagleBone Black
  • Simply plug it into J1 Port (Console Port) and start using it.
hopobject.shortdesc: Bluetooth 4.0 Console Adapter for BeagleBone Black
